title: Particular company should be able to assign itself to several countries
body: At the moment, there is 1-to-1 relation between companies and countries. It's OK for small business but what about bigger one? We have several dev-centers in 3 countries and extra sales-offices in more countries. Same time, WP7 registration intends we MUST use 1 country only. Moreover, recently GeoTrust claimed us to cancel US registration (current one) and re-register as Russia. Indeed, we're discouraged and not happy...
